name: A Threat Within
dialogue: Welcome to Northshire Abbey. I hate to burden you so soon, but we have a problem. Kobolds have infested the camps to the west. They're multiplying and becoming bolder. Kill 5 Kobold Workers to show them we won't tolerate their presence.
completionDialogue: Well done! You've shown those kobolds that we won't be intimidated. Here's some coin for your trouble. Marshal Thornwood will want to speak with you next.
